metadata.title: Global Climatology Maps of Monthly Marine Weather, Cyclones, Tides, Currents, and Sea Ice

creators.name: Naval Oceanography Command Detachment, Asheville, N.C., U.S. Department of the Navy

metadata.description: This publication is in the National Climatic Data Center's Foreign Data Library, and is one of many books, atlases, maps, charts and other printed materials received by the NCDC from many nations over the years.  This revises the first five volumes of the series U.S. Navy Marine Climatic Atlas of the World.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: This publication is in the National Climatic Data Center's Foreign Data Library, and is one of many books, atlases, maps, charts and other printed materials received by the NCDC from many nations over the years.  This revises the first five volumes of the series U.S. Navy Marine Climatic Atlas of the World.
